item.title: Composing Data from Multiple Services
item.description: One of the most common questions I get is how to compose data when different services each own their own data. You might have product details owned by the catalog service, pricing owned by sales, reviews owned by a reviews service, shipping information somewhere else, and order counts somewhere else.
